q: why does the man wear life jackets during drifting
pred: The man is wearing life jackets to ensure his safety while drifting on the river. Life jackets are essential for people engaging in water sports and activities, as they provide buoyancy and help keep the person afloat in case of an accident or if they fall into the water. The man is wearing a life jacket to minimize the risk of drowning and to make his experience on the river more enjoyable and secure.
